ActJudges Act
SubjectPitfield, the Hon. Ian H. ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY ** Supreme Court of BC
PrecisResignation and granting of an annuity to the Hon. IAN H. PITFIELD, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective June 30, 2010.
